name: Harbor Master Luna Freedrift
prompt:
# TTRPG Asset Generation Prompt

## Core Structure
[Asset Type: portrait]
[Game System: D&D 5e]
[Intended Use: VTT and Print reference]

## Detailed Description
Subject: Portrait of Harbor Master Luna Freedrift â€” notable figure of Aquabyssos/Aethermoor, human, adult, memorable traits
Environment: signature environment
Style: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), unified painterly collection style, grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, painterly fantasy realism, consistent across the collection, cosmic surrealism, impossible geometries, starfield grain, indigo glows, painterly character emphasis, avoid glamorization; grounded, diverse features
Technical Requirements: portrait orientation, token readable at 210x330+, aspect 1:1, resolution 1024x1024
Palette: indigos, violets, black, cold silver


## Visual Specifications
- Lighting: studio
- Detail Level: high detail for zoom, simplified for overview
- Composition: rule of thirds with clear focal points and visual flow
- Token Readability: facial features clear at small sizes (210x330 px)

## Practical Considerations
- Must be readable at intended viewing size
- Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings.
- Avoid embedded text unless specified; prefer iconography and numbered pins

## Negatives
- nonsense text, watermarks, captions, signatures, artist names; modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare; overly sexualized or glamorized portrayal

Think deeply about creating an asset that enhances gameplay immersion while maintaining practical usability for TTRPG sessions.
alt_text: Portrait of Harbor Master Luna Freedrift with evocative background; clear features readable at token size.
